entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56027
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56026
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring, json_middleware, plainTextSansFilter #56025
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #56024
  • [9.0-preview.5] OpenAPI with native AoT usage generates trim warnings #56023
  • Add support for an interface for OpenAPI operation transformations #56022
  • [9.0-preview.5] Confusing need to include parameters in custom JSON serializer for native AoT support with OpenAPI #56021
  • Function call from Blazor app gets stuck, works fine from Web API app #56020
  • Blazor: Support generating ID attributes based on the binding expression similar to how Name attributes are already generated #56019
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #56018
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #56017
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #56016
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes, plaintext #56015
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, json_middleware #56014

Closed

  • Move service worker support to the Static Web Assets SDK from the Blazor Webassembly SDK #46999
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Large remote videos fail to load in Blazor #56005
  • Interactive Blazor application doesn't work when accessed through "Dev Tunnels" #55962

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
